title: Shogun (YC W18)
description: I joined Shogun as the first software engineer and during my time in the company I had an opportunity to work on many valuable features and improvements. Shogun was accepted to the "YCombinator" and had huge growth.

title: Digital Clipboard (Microsoft Scale-Up London)
description: While working at Digital Clipboard I led the creation of a new React Native project with faster UI interactions, scalable frontend architecture and data synchronization layer. Digital Clipboard joined "Microsoft Scale-Up London" accelerator and launched.

title: Spacelab
description: Spacelab is a digital agency that my friends and I co-founded in Tbilisi, Georgia. We connect to clients all over the world offering mobile/web app development and UI/UX design work. Weâ€™ve been lucky to work on numerous interesting projects as a team.

title: Ministry of Labour, Health and Social Affairs of Georgia
description: My team was accountable to implement digital solutions for the ongoing Health Insurance reform to provide free health care for every citizen of Georgia. I enhanced existing reporting tools and wrote software to process and analyze terabytes of streaming data.
